text:
Created attachment 32775
excel template for testing

This is expected with the way POI handles the data currently. 

We provide ways to open the file read-only, e.g. via WorkbookFactory.create(OPCPackage.open(File file, PackageAccess.READ)) or new XSSFWorkbook(OPCPackage.open(File file, PackageAccess.READ)).
